name: DomSyncable
description: A behavior applied over any sync or syncable containers which will attempt to call get or post when the dom configuration changes.

attributes.name: auto
attributes.description: When true, changes to dom configuration will result in AJAX calls being made on the parent object.

attributes.name: autoDebounce
attributes.description: The time in milliseconds to debounce dom changes against. This prevents racing calls from keyboard manipulation or other user input binding scenarios.
